title: PatcherResponse
description: Response from the Patcher Agent containing a unified diff patch

rationale.description: Explanation of what was done or why no changes were made

risk_notes.description: Any risks or concerns about the changes

patch_unified_diff.description: The unified diff patch to apply (empty if noop/blocked)

touched_files.description: List of files modified by the patch

expected_verifier.description: Verification commands that should be run
